quote: Revenge did that to a person, it caused even the insecure and the meek to take foolhardy chances. After a while it became a way of life, the risks felt as natural as drawing a breath.
quote_letters: REVENGE DID THAT TO A PERSON IT CAUSED EVEN THE INSECURE AND THE MEEK TO TAKE FOOLHARDY CHANCES AFTER A WHILE IT BECAME A WAY OF LIFE THE RISKS FELT AS NATURAL AS DRAWING A BREATH
